children: This listing page display all your orders with actions to view, edit and delete. You can click the reference number to view the sale details. As other tables, the info & pagination links are at the bottom of the page.

content.name: p
children: The sale view is compact. It displays logo and company details at top then sale date, id and reference with qrcode. Followed by billed to details and order items. Lastly tax summary and sale comment.
